SEARCH
Module main_module
Package main_module.model.entities

Class Character

java.lang.Object
main_module.model.entities.Entity
main_module.model.entities.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdate
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Character extends Entity implements IUpdate
Represents an abstract character in the game. Extends the Entity class and implements the IUpdate interface.
